settings.title: GENOMICS & DIET
settings.quote: "YOU ARE WHAT YOU EAT" - Victor Lindlahr
settings.description: A good diet is the one that makes you feel happy, keeps you healthy, does not make you feel starved and prevents several health issues. Information present in our genes can be used to fine tune our diet to make it personalised. Based on your genetic make up, we share with you the diet pattern that you should be following for a healthy and happy lifestyle.

fields.label: Carbohydrate Sensitivit
fields.high:
Maintain carb intake <45%
For obesity & IR control
fields.low:
Maintain carb intake <60%
For obesity & IR control

fields.label: Fat Sensitivity
fields.high:
Fat intake not to exceed
15% of total calories
fields.normal:
Fat intake should be
20% of total calories
fields.low:
Fat intake advised up to
25% of total calories

fields.label: Protein Requirement
fields.high:
Protein supplements
needed along with dietary
source
fields.normal:
Maintain adequate protein
through balanced diet and
occasional supplements
fields.low:
Protein supplements not
needed, intake through
diet is enough

fields.label: Meal Frequency
fields.high:
4-5 small meals suggested
in a day
fields.low:
Less frequent meals, 2-3
meals are enough in a day

fields.label: Alcohol Sensitivity
fields.high:
High sensitivity, avoid
alcohol if possible,
especially the types of
beverages that trigger
intolerance reaction.
fields.normal:
Moderate sensitivity,
limit alcohol consumption
to 1-2 drinks per day,
monitor for any adverse
reactions
fields.low:
Low sensitivity, know
your alcohol intake limits,
consult doctor for
knowing your upper limit
of intake

fields.label: Caffeine Sensitivity
fields.high:
High sensitivity, do not
consume >4 cups/day
fields.normal:
Moderate sensitivity,
limit caffeine to 4-5
cups per day
fields.low:
Caffeine up to 5 cups a
day can be consumed

fields.label: Gluten Sensitivity
fields.high:
Gluten intake needs to be
reduced/stopped
fields.normal:
Monitor gluten intake,
reduce if experiencing
digestive issues
fields.low:
Gluten to be avoided in
cases of gastric distress

fields.label: Lactose Sensitivity
fields.high:
Milk & milk products need
to be avoided
fields.normal:
Limit milk & milk products,
consider lactose-free
alternatives if needed
fields.low:
Milk or milk products to
be avoided in gastric
distress

fields.label: Salt Sensitivity
fields.high:
Try to reduce overall salt
intake to up to 3-5 gm per
day
fields.normal:
Maintain salt intake
around 5 gm per day
fields.low:
Consumption of salt up to
5 gm/day can be done
